bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Pedro Nogueira, October 31, 1952

div1.p: Hench informs Nogueira of Cooke's death. Hanberry is now the only surviving volunteer.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Pedro Nogueira, October 31, 1952
div1.opener:
October 31, 1952
Dr. Pedro Nogueira
Marti 219, Marianao
Havana, Cuba
My dear Pedro:
div1.p:
I just heard this noon (through a clipping
sent to me by Mrs. Kean) of the death of Doctor
Cooke of Lexington, Virginia, apparently on
October 26 or 27. This means that Mr. Hanberry
is the only surviving volunteer.

Is there anything further I can do? I am
home again and at your service and will answer
promptly any requests you make.
div1.closer: Sincerely yours, P. S. Hench, M.D. PSH:alc
